# Advance Procurement Notice - 100 Sparks Redevelopment Project

### Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3714028045
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: October 18, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: January 20, 2023
* **Contract Status**: Expired

### Project Overview

As part of the Long Term Vision and Plan (LTVP) for the Parliamentary Precinct, Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has issued an advance procurement notice for the redevelopment of the site and properties located at 100 Sparks and 30 Metcalfe Street in downtown Ottawa.

The existing buildings on this site are nearing the end of their lifespan and do not meet the requirements for modern office space. The redevelopment project aims to modernize the facilities to provide sustainable and functional spaces for the Parliamentary Precinct.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Multiple trade agreements, including Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Parliament of Canada / Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contract Opportunities

Multiple construction services are required for the redevelopment project, including:

* Commercial and office building new construction
* Specialized public building construction
* Professional engineering services
* Architectural engineering
* Building construction management

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Mike Stirling (PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [mike.stirling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.stirling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
